Release Notes for

STM32WLxx Sigfox Middleware

Copyright © 2020 STMicroelectronics

Purpose

This Middleware provides the Sigfox Middleware for the stm32wlxx products. This covers

  • STM32WLxx devices

This driver is composed of 4 directories:

  • Crypto
  • Monarch
  • SigfoxLib
  • SigfoxLibTest

Update History

Main Changes

  • Release Notes update
  • Version of embedded Sigfox libraries:
    • Crypto : V1.0.0
    • Monarch: V2.0.1 (STMicroelectronics Patent)
    • SigfoxLib: V2.10.0
    • SigfoxLibTest: V0.8.0

Known limitations:

None
